Title: Lesson 1 Eyes, Nose, Mouth
Content: 本单元学习五官eyes, nose, mouth, ears, hair ,五官功能,3个动作smile, wink, dance及9种体育运动swim, ski, skate, football, volleyball, basketball, tennis, ping-pong, baseball。129-130课时本节课我们学习129-130课时Unit 9 Lesson 1 Eyes, Nose, Mouth主要学习内容如下:【1】学习3个五官:eyes眼睛,nose鼻子,mouth嘴巴   What’s this body part? It's nose/mouth. What are these? They are eyes. 【2】学习动作指令: Can you wink your eyes?眨眼 Can you close your eyes? 闭眼 Can you open张嘴/cover捂嘴/close闭嘴/zip your mouth? Can you touch your nose /mouth/eyes?【3】引导学生理解五官的数量关系:How many  noses/ eyes do you have?     I have one nose.     I have two eyes.

Title: Lesson 2 Ears, Face, Hair
Content: 本节课我们学习131-132课时Unit 9 Lesson 2 Ears, Face, Hair主要学习内容如下:【1】学习2个五官:Ears耳朵, Face脸, Hair头发What’s this body part? What are these? They are ears. It’s face. They are hair.【2】学习动作指令: Can you touch your ears/face/hair? 【3】引导学生理解五官数量关系:How many ears do you have?   I have two ears.    How many faces do you have?   How much hair do you have?     引导孩子说I have one face.     I have a lot of hair

Title: Lesson 3 What can … do? 五官功能
Content: 本节课我们学习133-134课时Unit 9 Lesson 3 What can … do? 五官功能主要学习内容如下:学习五官功能:What can eyes/nose/mouth/ears do?引导孩子回答:  Eyes can see. 眼睛可以看。   Nose can smell. 鼻子可以闻。                  Ears can hear. 耳朵可以听。  Mouth can eat and talk. 嘴可以吃和说。关于五官功能孩子们刚学,容易弄混,在课堂上,我们引导孩子们边说边做动作来理解五官的功能,您在家里也可以引导宝贝儿做些动作哦~

Title: Lesson 4 Review (1)
Content: 本节课我们学习135-136课时 Unit 9 Lesson 4 Review (1)主要学习内容如下:【1】复习学过的五官:eyes, nose, mouth, ears, face, hair     孩子们要学会说It's nose/mouth/face. They are eyes/ears/hair.【2】复习动作指令: Can you close/open/cover your eyes?  Can you open/close/zip/cover your mouth?    Can you touch your nose/mouth/eyes/ears/hair?【3】学习理解五官数量How many  noses/mouths/eyes/ears? How much hair do you have?         引导孩子说I have one nose/mouth.     I have two eyes/ears. I have a lot of hair我们最近几个月的知识学的都很难,请您坚持在家给宝贝儿放英语巩固复习哦~

Title: Lesson 5 Ability
Content: 本节课我们学习137-138课时Unit 9 Lesson 5 Ability主要学习内容如下:  【1】学习Ability: I can smile微笑/wink眨眼/dance跳舞.  【2】用一般疑问句对Abilities提问:Can you smile微笑/wink眨眼/dance跳舞？  引导孩子回答:Yes, I can./No, I can't.

Title: Lesson 6 Sports (1) 运动
Content: 本节课我们学习 139-140课时 Unit 9 Lesson 6 Sports (1) 运动主要学习内容如下:【1】学习3种运动: swim游泳,ski滑雪,skate滑冰;【2】用一般疑问句对sports提问:Can you swim/ski/skate? Yes, I can./No, I can’t.

Title: Lesson 7 Sports (2) 运动
Content: 本节课我们学习141-142课时 Unit 9 Lesson 7 Sports (2) 运动主要学习内容如下:【1】学习3种球类运动: football足球,volleyball排球,basketball排球;【2】用一般疑问句对sports提问:Can you play football/volleyball/basketball? Yes, I can./No, I can’t.

Title: Lesson 8 Sports (3) 运动
Content: 本节课我们学习143-144课时Unit 9 Lesson 8 Sports (3) 运动主要学习内容如下:【1】学习3种运动: tennis网球, ping-pong乒乓球, baseball棒球;【2】用一般疑问句对sports提问: Can you play tennis/ping-pong/baseball? Yes, I can./No, I can’t.

Title: Lesson 9 The Alphabet + Unit Review
Content: 本节课我们学习 145-146课时 Unit 9 Lesson 9 The Alphabet + Unit Review主要学习内容如下:【1】学习字母X,Y, Z所代表的单词:fox狐狸,yarn毛线,zebra斑马 What is X/Y/Z for?  X is for fox.  Y is for yarn.  Z is for zebra. ;【2】复习Unit 8-Unit 9所学的所有身体部位及动作指令。我们的课程越来越难了,建议您坚持每天给孩子听20分钟的英语,孩子会更有信心学下面的知识哦~感谢您的配合！
